Power Up Your Home or Business with Rotruck Electric

From simple repairs to complete rewiring projects, Rotruck Electric has the skills and expertise to solve all your electrical needs with safety and efficiency.

View my list of services.

Comprehensive Services

Whether you need assistance with residential, commercial, or industrial electrical work, I’ve got you covered. From troubleshooting faulty wiring to installing cutting-edge smart home systems, I can handle it all. No job is too big or small.

Customer Satisfaction

My ultimate goal is your satisfaction. I take pride in delivering exceptional service that exceeds your expectations. From our friendly customer support team to our skilled technicians, we ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience throughout your electrical project.

Proficient and Professional

I’m a licensed master electrician, trained and highly experienced in handling a wide range of electrical services. I stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and techniques to provide you with innovative solutions tailored to your needs.

Timely and Reliable

I understand the importance of prompt service when it comes to electrical issues. I value your time and strive to provide efficient and reliable solutions. Rest assured, I’ll arrive on time, equipped with the right tools, and work diligently to complete your project promptly.

Transparent Pricing

I believe in fair and transparent pricing. Before starting any work, I’ll provide you with a detailed estimate, outlining all the costs involved. Say goodbye to hidden surprises and hello to upfront honesty.

Uncompromising Safety

Your safety is my top priority. I adhere to the highest safety standards and strictly follow electrical codes and regulations. Rest easy knowing that your electrical work is in the hands of a reliable expert who prioritizes the well-being of you and your loved ones.

Services

Residential

No matter the size or complexity of the job, I offer a comprehensive range of residential electrical services tailored to meet your specific needs. My services include electrical inspections, lighting installations, outlet repairs, panel upgrades, circuit breaker replacements, electrical troubleshooting, and much more.

Commercial

I offer a wide range of commercial electrical services to address all your needs. Whether you require electrical installations for new constructions, electrical system upgrades, lighting design and retrofitting, electrical troubleshooting, or ongoing maintenance, I have the expertise and resources to deliver top-notch solutions.
